name: Song of Warding
description: A firm chorus that stiffens will and bars the path
effect: Minions and grunts cannot enter the song's area unless they succeed a resilience check (3); once a successful check has been made, they become immune to the effect until they complete a full rest

harmony_1.effect: Resilience check becomes 5 and includes standard tier; affects only the type mapped by the instrument  brass: divine; percussion: undead; wind: dark; strings: fey
